snippet: Ms. Neway, who won a Tony for “The Sound of Music,” was also heroine of Gian Carlo Menotti’s opera “The Consul.”
abstract: Patricia Neway, opera singer who won a Tony in 1960 for her role as the Mother Abbess in the original Broadway production of The Sound of Music, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Neway, who won a Tony for “The Sound of Music,” was also heroine of Gian Carlo Menotti’s opera “The Consul.”

headline.seo: Patricia Neway, Operatic Soprano Who Won a Tony, Dies at 92
headline.main: Patricia Neway, Operatic Soprano Who Won a Tony, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: Patricia Neway, 92, Soprano Who Won a Tony Award
